# Viewing Your Daily And Weekly Totals

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/viewing-your-daily-and-weekly-totals/

## Category
16 Reports

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
STAFF MEMBERS
Viewing Your Daily and Weekly Totals

As a staff member, you can view your own daily and weekly totals in the Mangomint mobile app if an Admin user has enabled the Can view own daily/weekly totals permission for you.

Your daily and weekly totals include details such as:

Number of completed services

Number of clients

Service and product revenue

Service and product commission

Number of products sold

Tips

Total commission + tips

Availability in hours

To view your daily and weekly totals, tap the menu icon and select My Daily Totals or My Weekly Totals.

Link copied
Daily totals
Link copied
Weekly totals

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
